title: Silent Spring by Rachel Carson - warned

content.prompt: In her influential 1962 work Silent Spring, Rachel Carson warned

choices.label: that discrimination against deaf Americans violated civil rights laws
that many cars built in the United States were unsafe
that poverty in the United States threatened the overall economy

topic.text: 8.13: The Environment and Natural Resources from 1968 to 1980

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
